CommandDefinition.Name: instantiaterepositoryaccessinstance
CommandDefinition.Description: Instantiates a previously registered repository access implementation.

Argument.Name: typename
Argument.Description: Name of the registered repository access implementation.

Argument.Name: instancename
Argument.Description: Name of the repository access instance.

Argument.Name: parameter
Argument.Description: Initialization parameters specific to the repository access implementation in <key>=<value> notation.

Argument.Name: workspaceName
Argument.Description: The name of the workspace that is used for the local repository directory.

Argument.Name: xmomAccessName
Argument.Description: Creates a new xmom access. (without import of XynaProperties and Capacities)
